EmailTemplate.name: Course Session Pdf to Student
EmailTemplate.subject: Course Module and Course Session's List
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name} ,
You have successfully registered for {!Course.Name} course. We wish you best of luck for your upcoming sessions related to course. Please find the attached file, enlisting Module's list and Session's list.
Please Click this link to Register a seat under an Upcoming Batch. Best Wishes Utilitarian Labs
